module.name: Backup & Restore

module.changelog: *2.10.0.17* #5607, #5612, fixes issues with remote restores also *2.10.0.16* #5598, #5599 *2.10.0.15* full template changes *2.10.0.14* bug fixes *2.10.0.13* bug fixes *2.10.0.12* bug fixes *2.10.0.11* bug fixes *2.10.0.10* bug fixes *2.10.0.9* improve eventstream log *2.10.0.8* bug fixes *2.10.0.7* bug fixes *2.10.0.6* fixed legacy restore and per file restore bugs *2.10.0.5* fixes upload and legacy restore *2.10.0.4* small, critical variable *2.10.0.3* misc bug fixes *2.10.0.2* #5418 *2.10.0.1* don't make jquery.jstree.min.js dynamic it blocks caching *2.10.0.0* Backup Module Rewrite
